physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of elephants, flowers, and horse carriages surrounding a deity in the center. The chakla is pentagonal in shape, with a triangular top and square bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) deities depictions (visual works) beadwork (visual works)
